DOC.detailed_description: Exclusively formula-fed infant participate two 2-week feed period 2 infant formula . Daily tolerance record keep caregiver .
DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn infant Fullterm ( > 37 week gestation ) 02 month ( birth56 day ) age enrollment Infant exclusively formulafed least 2 day prior enrollment Having obtain his/her legal representative 's informed consent Known suspect cowmilk allergy Congenital illness malformation Significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease Currently participate another clinical study
